overview: A long time ago, through the fault of people, a snake wakes up, which gradually turns into a dragon. The snake crawls out of the cave and begins to sweep away the nearby auls, devouring the inhabitants, giving rise to unprecedented fear. And only one golden eagle enters the fight to protect its chick. In this fight, the golden eagle wins and the snake disappears into its cave. The golden eagle, taking its chick, flies far away. And the snake remains hiding in its den, biding its time. Years pass, and the snake crawls out of the cave again ...
title: Muzbalak
